database.name: VIEW SCR_INVXBOE_V
database.view: SELECT DISTINCT boe.sco_billofexchange_id || inv.c_invoice_id AS scr_invxboe_v_id, boefrom.invoiceref_id, boe.sco_billofexchange_id AS boeref, inv.c_invoice_id, inv.ad_client_id, inv.ad_org_id, inv.isactive, inv.created, inv.createdby, inv.updated, inv.updatedby, inv.c_withholding_id, inv.withholdingamount, inv.c_doctypetarget_id, inv.em_scr_physical_documentno AS physical_documentno, inv.dateinvoiced, inv.c_bpartner_id, inv.c_bpartner_location_id, inv.description, inv.fin_paymentmethod_id, inv.c_paymentterm_id, inv.em_sco_aval_id, inv.docstatus, inv.em_sco_isprotested AS isprotested, inv.em_scr_isreceived AS isreceived, inv.em_sco_isboerenewal AS isboerenewal, inv.grandtotal, inv.totallines, inv.grandtotal - inv.totallines AS totallinestax, inv.c_currency_id, inv.ispaid, inv.em_sco_useprepayment AS useprepayment, inv.totalpaid, inv.outstandingamt, inv.dueamt, inv.daystilldue, COALESCE(((SELECT to_date(now()) + inv.daystilldue FROM dual)), to_date(now())) AS datenextdue, inv.percentageoverdue, inv.finalsettlement, inv.daysoutstanding, inv.documentno, inv.m_pricelist_id, inv.salesrep_id, inv.c_order_id, inv.poreference, inv.dateacct, inv.em_sco_boe_type AS boe_type, inv.em_sco_boe_to_id AS boe_to_id, inv.em_sco_diverse_acc_glitem_id AS diverse_acc_glitem_id, inv.em_sco_isforfree, inv.isprinted, inv.dateprinted, inv.em_sco_glosadesc, inv.processed FROM sco_boe_from boefrom, sco_billofexchange boe, c_invoice inv WHERE boefrom.sco_billofexchange_id = boe.sco_billofexchange_id AND boe.sco_billofexchange_id = inv.em_sco_boe_id
